short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Celebrate every win in style. You deserve this.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform every achievement into a moment of joy! With Confetti Celebration, shower your screen with vibrant confetti at the click of a button. Tap once, twice, or ten times - fill your entire screen with celebration!

ðŸŽŠ WHY YOU'LL LOVE IT:
- Instant celebration with one click
- Optional "Ta-da!" sound effect (easily toggle on/off)
- Click as many times as you want - more clicks, more confetti!
- Works anywhere, anytime
- Completely private - zero data collection, no tracking
- Light, fast, and secure
- No ads, no popups, no permissions needed*

Whether you've finished a task, reached a goal, or just need a burst of happiness - you deserve this celebration! Because life's wins, big and small, are worth celebrating with as much confetti as you want.

HOW TO USE:
1. Click the extension icon
2. Toggle sound on/off as you prefer
3. Hit "Launch Confetti" (as many times as you like!)
4. Watch the magic unfold!

Privacy First: This extension operates entirely on your device. We don't collect data, track usage, or require any personal information. Celebrate freely and privately!

Add some sparkle to your digital victories today!

*Only requires standard Chrome permissions to display confetti animation
